problem.markdown:
>>The role of the cluster manager is to:<<
( ) Orchestrate tasks to executors on worker nodes (x) Maintain resource utilization information across the cluster and provide it to the master ( ) Execute the tasks ( ) Managing a single core

multiplechoiceresponse.label: The role of the cluster manager is to:

choicegroup.choice: Orchestrate tasks to executors on worker nodes
Maintain resource utilization information across the cluster and provide it to the master
